name: █████ is a bliss
description:
This little game is part of 2nd Vtuber Game Jam.

Play as a chicken working for the KFP, Kiara Fried Phoenix, fast-food empire. Your job is to censor the undesired, inconvenient information. Your job is to look at an event and choose what should be hidden from the public.

Can you protect the chicken from the truth?
